sentences.en: “We have to hold on here, ” said Saheer al-Saidi, a militiaman speaking at rebel command post inside the town that afternoon.
sentences.cn: “我们必须守住这里”，民兵组织成员萨赫尔.阿尔萨义迪这天下午在该市中心的叛军司令部表示。

sentences.en: A militiaman happened to notice the rascal.
sentences.cn: 一位民兵偶然注意到了这个坏家伙.

sentences.en: A militiaman surprised him in the act.
sentences.cn: 他正在这样干时被一位民兵撞见了.

sentences.en: It'so happened that a militiaman was passing by . ( A militiaman happened to be passing by. )
The Field Mouse immediately enlisted as a militiaman and stood sentry duty outside the dirt walls.
sentences.cn: 地老鼠马上参加了民兵,在土墙外边站岗放哨.

sentences.en: The militiaman walked the spy off.
sentences.cn: 民兵把那个特务带走了.

sentences.en: The militiaman was on the trail of the secret agent.
